132.content:
Somewhere within an abandoned warehouse, a young woman wearing a high school uniform and blazing red hair is found unconscious sitting in a chair wrapped in chains. A bright light is focus on her, where outside the light's diameter is pure darkness.

"Ugh." She slowly comes too, "What the-?"

She tries to get up but finds herself unable to move. Eyes widening she notices the chains binding her to the chair, turning her attention to the ends of the chain she sees knives on the chain's ends embedded deep within the ground.

She recognizes the chains, "Shizuku you bitch! We had an alliance remember?" She struggles to get out, but the chains held her down. She grits her teeth, 'When I get my hands on her."

The sound of a cart being pushed brought Akane back the situation at hand. Turning her head to the source her eyes widen to see Natsuru, only there was some key differences.

One, Natsuru was in his kampfer form, meaning he's practically a she right now. Second, she was wearing that revealing maid outfit she previously worn during the cultural festival. Three, she was fat.

Despite being unable to move much Akane can't help but stare wide eyed at the chubby Natsuru as the latter pushes some sort of dining cart covered with a white sheet. She didn't expect Natsuru to let him, er, herself go like that and wear that outfit at the same time.

Her once impressive bustline and hips were now nearly double in size, and Akane could see that a rather big belly pushing its way out from the confines from Natsuru's maid costume. Natsuru's face also look a little puffy but it wasn't so much, just making her cheeks a bit more pinchable.

Natsuru's maid outfit didn't do much to conceal Natsuru's new girth. The blue hair woman's bust was close of spilling out of the thing, and the skirt was practically force up by the wide hips, exposing Natsuru's panties to the wandering eye.

"What in the world happen to you partner?" Akane thought outloud before she heard the sound of another cart coming from another direction. Turning her head, Akane's eyes widen to see Shizuku also in revealing maid costume, also pushing a dining cart that's covered, and also fat as well.

While Natsuru was plump, Shizuku was borderlining obese. Shizuku's stomach was also spilling out of the maid outfit, the chubby belly hanging, ending to just about the waist. Lastly Shizuku's face was no longer thin as Akane remember, it was puffy now and a hint of a double chin was showing.

Despite being bound up, Akane was laughing her head off, "I must say class rep that's a good for ya! What are you planning with your new body, attract all the chubby chasers out there?" She laughs again, but soon stops when she sees Shizuku not respond what so ever, she just keeps on pushing that dining cart.

'The deuce?' Akane thinks to herself as she takes a hard look at two women. Both of their eyes gave off a hollow look, as if they were hypnotize or something.

'Well that explains Natsuru as a plus size maid and Shizuku is a freakin' cow.' Akane narrow her eyes, 'Something ain't right here.'

Soon both maids stop in front of the bound red head, let go of their respective carts, turn towards the center, and bow as if someone of great power/importance was coming.

"Akane-chan is ready for you Kaede-ojou-sama." Both maids say in a monotone voice.

Out of the darkness came one of the school's top beauties and one of the few people on Akane's "Shit List". Kaede Sakura in the flesh, and unfortuanly the only normal weight one Akane mentally added.

Kaede waves the two maids off, "Thank you. Please standby until I need you two okay?" She finishes with a giggle, making Akane grind her teeth in fury.

Natsuru and Shizuku gave a bow, "Yes Ma'am." They soon stood up and went back to the darkness, their enlarged forms disappear with it's shroud.

Kaede sighs and places a hand on her cheek, "They are a great help the two of them." She then turns towards Akane with a smile, "Why hello Akane-chan."

"Don't Akane-chan me you damn bitch." Akane snarls through clech teeth.

Kaede's face turn hurt, "Is that how you act towards your friends Akane-chan?"

Akane's mouth curls into a feral grin, "How about telling Shizuku the whale to undo her damn chains on me and I'll give you twelve rounds, buddy."

Kaede's face went from hurt to neutral, she covers her mouth with her right hand, her eyes went from their usually yuppiness to downright predatory, "My, my, my such threatening words coming from you. It's a wonder that the police hasn't arrested such a vulgar girl as you."

"Well it seems the school idol shows her true colors, Masumi will pay me a fortune for this scoop." Akane's grin never leaving her.

Kaede gives a sigh, "And I prepare such a loving treat for you, it would feel like such a waste if you just snap and snarl when someone is trying to be friendly."

Akane's face then went serious, "Let's just say you ain't on my top ten. More imporantly, what did you do with that space case of a partner of mine and that manipulative witch Shizuku?"
